Hero.title: The Cultural Copilot for Drivers
Hero.subtitle: Turn every kilometer into a contextual discovery. Zero screens, zero traffic violations.

Simulator.title: 100% Hands-Free Contextual Triggering
Simulator.subtitle: Our City OS engine uses bearing-logic and offline caching to trigger narratives exactly at the right monument, without the driver ever looking at a screen.

EnterpriseFork.b2gDesc: City OS provides narrative sovereignty, structural tourism mapping, and guaranteed legal compliance safely delivered at the wheel.
EnterpriseFork.b2bDesc: Transform your fleet into automated local guides. Drive zero CAPEX and secure massive ancillary revenue streams.

Hero.title: The Definitive Infrastructure for Smart Tourism Destinations (DTI).
Hero.subtitle: Transform your city into a certified Smart Destination. TUGGI City OS aligns your territorial governance with global pillars of Technology, Sustainability, Accessibility, and Data.

Regulatory.title: 100% Street-Legal & Risk-Free.
Regulatory.desc: Endorsing screen-based tourism apps exposes the municipality to traffic violation liabilities. TUGGI's native 100% hands-free architecture guarantees legal compliance, protecting the Mayor's management and the citizens.

Sustainability.title: Sustainability & Public Utility
Sustainability.desc: Redirect traffic and communicate efficiently without screen barriers.
Sustainability.feat1Desc: Use AI triggers to actively redirect tourists from saturated historical centers to peripheral economic zones.
Sustainability.feat2Desc: Deploy dynamic audio geofences for road closures, events, or severe weather alerts, communicating with foreign drivers in their native language hands-free.

Accessibility.title: Universal Accessibility
Accessibility.desc: Universal Accessibility is the hardest DTI pillar. TUGGI solves sensory barriers instantly: Audio-first navigation for visually impaired tourists, and geolocated Closed Captions for hearing-impaired passengers. WCAG 2.1 AA compliant.

Intelligence.title: Data-Driven Tourism Intelligence
Intelligence.desc: Governments are usually blind to tourist flow. TUGGI delivers anonymized telemetry: know exactly which routes are taken, at what times, and in which languages, enabling hyper-targeted international marketing campaigns.
Intelligence.heatmapsDesc: Real-time density graphs for any active route.
Intelligence.demographicsDesc: Know exact demographics via active audio streams.

Mandate.title: Zero CAPEX Deployment & Mega-Event Readiness
Mandate.desc: Distribute the OS without digital marketing spend: QR codes on official parking meters, highway toll booths, and historical access totems. Instant plug-and-play readiness for massive influxes like the 2026 Winter Games or World Cup.

Hero.title: De-commoditize Your Fleet. Boost Your RevPA.
Hero.subtitle: Transform a standard vehicle rental into a Premium Cultural Experience. Generate massive ancillary revenue with zero hardware investment and near-zero infrastructure costs.

Financial.col1Desc: Replace dead GPS rental revenue with a scalable software-as-a-service margin driver.
Financial.col2Desc: Near-Zero Entry Cost: No specialized hardware to buy or maintain. The model is 100% BYOD (Bring Your Own Device), eliminating battery swaps and equipment depreciation.
Financial.col3Desc: Deploy across your entire national fleet in 24 hours via QR Code integration at the counter.

Risk.title: Maximize Uptime. Minimize Liability.
Risk.desc: Driver distraction is a major cause of fleet damage. TUGGI's 100% hands-free, audio-only triggers keep the driver's eyes on the road. Reduce minor collisions and vehicle downtime in workshops. Safety is not just a feature; it's an operational saving.

NPS.title: The War on NPS: From Metal to Experience.
NPS.desc: In a commoditized market, the winner is the one who provides the best journey. TUGGI turns the rental car into a private local guide, exploding customer satisfaction and brand loyalty.

Brand.title: Your Brand, Our Engine.
Brand.desc: Offer a unique experience without the constraints of tech exclusivity. We provide White-Label and Co-branded interfaces. Customize the app's voice, colors, and even create 'Exclusive Premium Routes' sponsored by your rental brand to differentiate from competitors.

ESG.title: Seamless Digital Deployment
ESG.desc: Your only investment is in digital activation and on-site signage (QR displays), which typically ROI on day one of rentals. Cultivate your ESG targets by fostering the local creative economy and decompressing overtourism through guided routes.
